title: Retail sales value of yogurt & sour milk products in the United Kingdom 2009 to 2018
yAxis: Retail value sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic depicts the manufacturers ( Retail ) value of sporting goods equipment , fitness equipment , yogurt apparel , athletic footwear , and yogurt licensed merchandise in the million from 2009 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Retail value amounted to about 2984.2 million U.S.

Sporting goods manufacturers Retail value - additional information Retail value of sporting goods in the million reached 3063.4 million U.S. in 2014 , the highest figure to-date and a eight million dollar increase on the figure from 2014 .
